name: Choose Your Own Adventure! A Guided Poetic Tour of St Andrews
name_original: Choose Your Own Adventure! A Guided Poetic Tour of St Andrews
description:
Choose Your Own Adventure!

A guided poetic tour of St Andrews

If, like us, you're sorry to miss your annual strolls through the streets of St Andrews, never fear: Choose Your Own Adventure is here to help! In this interactive tour of St Andrews, poet Hannah Raymond-Cox will guide you between festival venues and some of other favourite haunts, interspersing the journey with poems, photos and videos. Thanks go to Scott McDonald for filming, and to many StAnza poets for allowing their work to be included.

This piece was developed for StAnza 2021 as a commission.
